trans-unit.source: Represents a control that renders text that can be changed by the user.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo que compõe o texto que pode ser alterado pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> and those that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, provide a text property that can be changed by a page user.
trans-unit.target: Controla, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>e os que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, forneça uma propriedade de texto que pode ser alterada por um utilizador de página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When the text property is changed, an event is raised to notify handlers that the property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade text é alterada, um evento é desencadeado para notificar os processadores que a propriedade foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement IEditableTextControl must define the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: As classes que implementam IEditableTextControl tem de definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: Although the IEditableTextControl interface contains only the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event, it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> interface, which defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Embora a interface IEditableTextControl contém apenas o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>evento, qual herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl>interface, que define um <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>

trans-unit.source: To implement the IEditableTextControl interface, a control must define the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> event that occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar a interface IEditableTextControl, um controlo tem de definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged>eventos que ocorre quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>alterações de propriedade entre pedidos POST para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl.TextChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: In those classes, the event is raised through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
trans-unit.target: Nessas classes, o evento é gerado através de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>métodos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnTextChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A class that implements the IEditableTextControl interface could define a similar method for raising the event.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que implementa a interface IEditableTextControl definir um método semelhante para gerar o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content of the text changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o conteúdo do texto alterado entre pedidos POST para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The TextChanged event occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: O evento TextChanged ocorre quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>alterações de propriedade entre pedidos POST para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: An implementation of this event can be found in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação deste evento pode ser encontrada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>
